name: Jern Drift DX
description:
A cool driving game where you start at the mid production stage of an indie game and finish it off for us by making the levels :)

W - accel

S - brake / reverse

A D - steer

0 1 2 3 - change camera

DEL - retry level (?)

Backspace - reset car (?)

ESC - pause(?) menu (??)

EDIT MODE

LMB - place block

Scroll - change block

RMB - rotate

X - delete mode

V - validate mode

T - test mode

M - save map

all the menus suck so you might have to alt+f4 a bunch to enjoy this racing masterpiece.

Assets Used 

Ultra Dynamic Sky (them clouds)

Unreal Sports Car (we just took the rims tho)

Blueprint File SDK (for the loading and the saving of files)
